title: Congressman Cohen Hails Congressional Gold Medal Ceremony Honoring Monuments Men (Steve Cohen)
text: ( Source : Steve Cohen ) [ Washington, D.C. ] - Congressman Steve Cohen ( TN-09 ) today attended the Congressional Gold Medal Ceremony honoring the a group of men and women from 13 nations, known as the Monuments Men , for the work they did to
